## Classification: Basic Concepts and Techniques

### Installing necessary libraries
```{r warning=FALSE}
if(!require(pacman))
  install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, rpart, rpart.plot, caret, 
  lattice, FSelector, sampling, pROC, mlbench)

```

```{r warning=FALSE}
options(digits = 3)
```

### Loading the dataset
```{r warning=FALSE}
childcare_costs <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-05-09/childcare_costs.csv')
counties <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-05-09/counties.csv')
childcare_costs |> glimpse()
```

```{r}
childcare_costs <- childcare_costs |>
  mutate(across(where(is.logical), factor, levels = c(TRUE, FALSE))) |>
  mutate(across(where(is.character), factor))
```

### Fitting different Models to our Training Data
```{r}
summary(childcare_costs)
```
### Implementing Decision Trees
```{r}
library(rpart)
childcare_costs_matrix <- as.matrix.default(childcare_costs)
```

```{r}
tree_default <- childcare_costs_matrix |> 
  rpart(type ~ ., data = _)
tree_default
```
